title: Risk weighting slows unsecured loan growth
description: The growth of unsecured credit in India, including personal loans and credit card outstanding, slowed to 18% in April from 23% in November 2023. The Reserve Bank of India's risk weighting on such exposures aims to reduce delinquencies in the banking system.
